name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior DevOps Engineer with 13+ years of experience in delivering high-performance applications, specializing in **AWS**, **Terraform**, and **CI/CD** pipelines. Proficient in deploying and managing containerized applications using **Kubernetes** and experienced in implementing **GitOps** practices for streamlined development workflows. Skilled in scripting with **Bash** and **Groovy** to automate operational tasks. Experienced in robust cloud security frameworks, ensuring compliance with industry standards.
In addition to DevOps expertise, I bring hands-on knowledge of **Python** for backend development, and I am adept at building AI/ML-powered solutions using **FastAPI** and **Django**. A solid track record of developing applications for the healthcare and financial sectors, I am dedicated to creating reliable, compliant solutions while pushing the boundaries of innovation.
